website_summaries.verdict: The ZTE Axon Pro is powerful, stylish and inexpensive, but the OnePlus 2 has a lower price and more compelling features.
pros: The competitively priced ZTE Axon Pro has a crisp display and a stylish design, and its capable dual rear camera comes packed with useful photo tools
cons: The phone's call volume is low and its battery life is unexceptional

customer_reviews.title: Could be one of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone when it was at $323 a month ago. So far I have loved this phone. The camera is amazing, especially the bookah you can do. Pros Quick charge Runs games very smoothly 2 year warranty Really fast overall Good battery life Sounds amazing to listen to music, great DAC Feels really well built The screen is amazing Almost stock Android Works flawlessly on cricket, which is att btw Unlocked Very little crapware Cons Speakers are OK Seems to freeze a little to much, probably software related No expanded memory Overall this phone is one of the best I have ever used, even just for using it to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: kicker58

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone, needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Phone doesn't feel quite finished. It's missing some key features, like a functional launcher. Updates have helped a bit. The phone can't use it's powerful processor as it overheats immediately 45-60° C when doing anything remotely cpu intensive (every game). Battery life on standby is good, if you have a lot of apps going in the background it'll last 8 hours, assuming you don't turn the screen on. Screen on time using heavily, it'll last 3 hours, maybe. Metal back and super hot always makes my hands sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Wkp_Taco

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Had this phone for 3 months and it runs as if the processor is corrupted with zero battery life. Contacted ZTE guarding this issue almost 2 weeks ago to do their advanced exchange program. It cost me almost $500 (which would be refunded once they received the damaged phone) and still no new phone. And no one knows why. Too late to get a refund from the seller and the MFG full of empty promises.
customer_reviews.author: Merrisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone Really fast charge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great budget phone I don't game But I can stream and do everything else like pay bills, shop, etc with no problems. Fast, smooth, no problems whatsoever. Charges fast and holds the charge. If you don't want to spend a fortune but want a goodphone, choose this. I had 2 BLU phone and had charging problems with both. BLU told me they aren't repsonsible for batteries not charging and refused to fix the phone By this time my BLU had stopped working. ZTE going strong. Not a cloud in sight.
customer_reviews.author: Nightengalejml

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have been battery issues. After a full ...
customer_reviews.text: To clarify, I purchased a refurbished Axon through Amazon Warehouse Deals. Seems to have been battery issues that caused the phone to be returned. After a full night charging, the phone never reached 100c/o. During use the battery is dropping really fast compared to ZTE zMax I had. In less than an hour I'm losing 10% or more. I turned off Arguis fit tracker to see If that helps. Update, phone e did reach 100% on second day. However continues to drain very rapidly. Aside from the battery issue, this phone is 5 stars. Great size, light weight, awesome sound and camera, very clear display!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: DROOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 30 day review of the ZTE Axom Pro. I am completely blown away at the capabilities of this phone! I mainly got it for its 4K UHD video capability. I have tried the video under dark noisy bar band conditions as well as in daylight. I am in love with this phone! It is also the first phone I have been impressed with for playing music. The speakers rock! I have yet to use the earphones that came with it. This phone is very easy to use and the initial set up was pretty intuitive. My phone is currently used with NET10 and I have not had any issues. WiFi range is really great too!
customer_reviews.author: skildpadder

customer_reviews.title: 3) no included TPU case like US version 4) NO FINGERPRINT SENSOR ON THE BOTTOM ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from this provider..even through Prime. 1) There is a label over the factory label on the outside of the box-red flag! 2) unlike american version those ARE not dual front facing speakers- the top gril is cosmetic! 3) no included TPU case like US version 4) NO FINGERPRINT SENSOR ON THE BOTTOM stay away I returned mine in 1 hour!
customer_reviews.author: low fat guy

customer_reviews.title: Phone does not work anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this phone for a little over 2 months now, everything was working great. This last weekend though the phone shut off randomly while charging and now it will not turn back on, and will not even respond to a charger cable being plugged into it. Also, when I plug the phone into a computer nothing pops up in the yeah manager section for the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Pearle

customer_reviews.title: however I don't like it because the volume seems too low at maximum ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this phone in error. I really wanted the axon mini 7. however I don't like it because the volume seems too low at maximum volume. it doesn't have dual sima= and a lot of features as the mini 7. only good about this phone is camera and the 64gb storage.
customer_reviews.author: SLIM

customer_reviews.title: Bad service and design.
customer_reviews.text: While the phone has a quality feel to it and a very nice display, I was very disappointed with the ear piece. For some reason the ear piece is off set. Mean it's not in the middle of the phone, so you have to awkwardly place your ear on the right side so you can hear the person on the other end. Also I was in areas that I got excellent service from my older phones and for some reason this phone would constantly lose service. I immediately returned this phone and ordered something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Q.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it quality was bad for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Its a good cheap phone but back at its peak price point it was too expensive for the return on investment
customer_reviews.author: David Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend if moving from BLU LifeOne X2
customer_reviews.text: Works well much better then BLU LifeOne X2 my daughters had more responsive better features worth the price. I have the Axion 7 another step up from this phone, both are better then BLU Phones we have had several BLU's before.
customer_reviews.author: Sneaky Pete

customer_reviews.title: calling) It's like I have an mp3 player
customer_reviews.text: Big issues with the sim port. I have some a big problem with the phone and I do not know who ZTE employee to talk with. The thing is that the phone does not recognize the sim chip. It worked the first day, but then the second it just did not. I talked to carrier company and they said that the sim was activated but that there was something wrong with the phone. Now this phone cannot do the job that a basic phone does(texting, calling) It's like I have an mp3 player.
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: I like the rapid charge
customer_reviews.text: I'm upset that in less than 10 days the price dropped $50.. I haven't yet used the warranty, but I expect I will. I think it's roughly $80 deductible... (Furthermore the international version is the one with the fingerprint unlock) In loading my contacts, I find it a bit slow. I like the rapid charge. I dislike needing to use headphones for the built-in FM Radio feature. I dislike the Yahoo sports inserted in the OS Hard to find many cases for it. Kernel: 3.10.49 /
customer_reviews.author: P. S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Look like ZTE going forward with it performance no lag. Fast... fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Great phone works great , the JBL earphones are amazing great sound and the shipping was pretty fast 3 days sooner than the due date nd if you like taking pictures the front camera is 8 MP better than other top sellers . Highly recommend this phone .
customer_reviews.author: MafiaSpyder

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN HTC ONE M9
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my HTC ONE M9 (That I run over with a 150 ton truck). This phone is faster, smoother, better at running the same apps as the HTC . LOVE IT!!!👍👍👌
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Coston

customer_reviews.title: I love the phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone ! , it's almost like a steal. Feels premium, very responsive and extremely fast. I have witnessed no lag what so ever ...compared to my lg g4 this phone wins in a performance test. And the ability to set different users is a plus !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Swann

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone. I was pending to buy the new Moto Z, but regarding to the cost, I've choosen this one. No regrets so far. Work great. It's just a little big for what I was used to, but I'm getting used to it too.
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: DAC + DOLBY = FANTASTIC SOUND, even with google play :)
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! With dolby back on marshmallow. Simply fantastic! No dolby, equalizers etc. deliver the fine sound you get with axon's dolby :). Yes, battery life sucks! But I don't care...the sound, even with playstore is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of cool features, some I haven't even got to yet
customer_reviews.text: The ZTE Axon has exceeded all of my expectations! Everything from the packaging to actual performance is breathtaking. Setup was a breeze and once you're active, man this thing is FAST. Lot's of cool features, some I haven't even gotten to yet, but I wanted to make sure that anyone considering an unlocked device knows they don't need to look any further. Go ahead and purchase the AXON and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed device. The cameras take awesome pictures and video, and the quality is amazing. I can definitely see a difference in speeds with the 8-core processor. It has a very durable feel when holding it, and the screen resolution is great. Overall, with the great device specs offered on this device, the ZTE Axon is well worth the price. Absolutely satisfied with this purchase! Not to mention, you get some pretty cool JBL headphones in the box. Nicely done ZTE!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dual cameras with 4K recording
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dual cameras with 4K recording! I love my Axon because it has amazing dual cameras with 4 K recording. Besides, the price is attractive comparing to the other high-end smartphones on the market. I would recommend my friends to buy this nice phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the screen came off from the side very bad build quality
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Very happy at this price point. There are definitely better phones out there, but this one offers a lot of bang for your buck. It performs well and didn't come with too much bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Holds up!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone that runs smoothly. The cameras stand up pretty well even after almost a year after it was bought, you just have to zoom in rather than getting close to very small objects. The screen has NO cracks or scratches unlike many top brands and the two year warranty is very comforting. The earbuds have not broken or been distorted in any way, which was one of the main reasons I got this over others in the price range. It is very easy to use and customizable like most Androids, but this is completely off contract and can be easily used on prepaid.
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great phone works on mint sim T-MOBLE in the USA
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, I love it. Package arrived earlier than expected. Good shipping
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: This phone is responsive and beautiful, all the technology of a flagship at a ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is responsive and beautiful, all the technology of a flagship at a price that makes you wonder what the big boys are charging us for. Snapdragon blazing fast 4GB of ram second only to the S5 for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Cardin

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!! Axon Rules!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to get the Axon in gold which is definitely an attention grabber especially with the 5.5 inch display. The camera on the AXON is Amazing! The pictures I take are clear and full of life. The Snapdragon processor has getting to my pages fast. Overall, the Axon is a phenomenal device and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: Performance is good on the phone, but battery life is real bad. I find my charging at least twice a day . This is with moderate use
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Design is beautiful, sounds is very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for a week, I want to be with her for three years. Design is beautiful, sounds is very good, screen is good, smooth runs APP. Indoor camera is soso...
customer_reviews.author: luckyevan

customer_reviews.title: Flagship specs,  mid level price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone, very fast, a few quirks here and there but definitely flagship quality. Get the case from ZTE.
customer_reviews.author: Huan Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone a month ago. Really like the design with front facing speakers. The 5.5" screen is very vibrant, crisp in color. The phone feel great in the hand. The phone comes with a JBL headsets to fully take advantage of HiFi audio feature. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: EcoDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product how long is the us warranty and what does it cover?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice phone, very cool, better than Samsung, awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Weiquan Xu

customer_reviews.title: Best underlooked phone out there
customer_reviews.text: Incredible performance for price, on par with phones costing $100's more. Use it everyday for work- emails, photo docs, scanning, emailing docs back to office, just a beast, a workhorse. Octa-core performance never lets me down, no overheating. Call quality & sound awesome for price point. Was looking at S6 also at the time, but decided to save my money & go with ZTE. I'm completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: One of The Best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phones I have purchase in a long time. I love the size and camera. The speakers are louder than most phones for music and speaker phone. This phone is the perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaGuy

customer_reviews.title: AXON did a good job on following things
customer_reviews.text: AXON did a good job on following things: 1. The camera which makes the picture looks great 2. The sound system which brings a HIFI experience 3. The charging is fast, like I can get 70% power back in 1 hour. 4. The screen is great. The only cons would be it eats a lot of battery when I use screen often.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Its Hi-Fi Audio is excellent for music playing
customer_reviews.text: Its Hi-Fi Audio is excellent for music playing. And the JBL in-ear headphones are cool. This is really a amazing phone for it's fast, smooth and smart. By the way, mine is phthalo blue.
customer_reviews.author: PKs

customer_reviews.title: The screen is fantastic, and 4gb of ram has lots of promise
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the phone with high hopes... The screen is fantastic, and 4gb of ram has lots of promise. However the Snapdragon 810 overheating issue really hampers performance, and the UI is inexplicably sluggish, even when using Google's now launcher. Fit and finish is a mixed bag; pretty nice metal finish, but the glass on the bottom left of the screen is lifted up higher than the others, causing light leakage from the left capacitive button. Returned the phone, despite really wanting to make it work as a daily driver.
customer_reviews.author: J. Salenga

customer_reviews.title: Great options on the phone at half the price of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great options on the phone at half the price of the competition. Also gave my the freedom to get away from the 2 yr payment contract situation. It's a phone not a car for crying out loud.
customer_reviews.author: joseph c dingfelder

customer_reviews.title: Great for My Country!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. There are a lot of detailed reviews on here so I won't go on and on. It works great. it's fast. Camera is sharp. I use it in Southeast Asia and it works wonderfully. Nano sim is easy to switch out. I haven't tried it in many countries yet. But I fully plan on it working when I travel and get sim cards in other countries. I have not used this phone in the US.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek design and easy to use. Gets a lot attention when I pull it out. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Commons after using axon for one month
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone. But do not have double tap to wake up function. I can not manage permissions of my apps. Like forbit GPS function for some of my apps.
customer_reviews.author: yinxiaoyi

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but....
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. I have T-Mobile and it kept disconnecting from the network. I am really bummed because it is such a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned buyer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size with an outstanding camera. I would highly recommend this over a Samsung due to price and features. Good job ZTE on a quality build!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Man

customer_reviews.title: Zte axon
customer_reviews.text: This phone was bought for my son. He really like the phone but it's kind of glitchy on metro pcs. Mainly with the sim card not registering. Restart the phone and it works again.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Creason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice phone with pretty good camera and hifi and competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect phone. very good video and audio experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera. I think this could beat the iphone for camera.
customer_reviews.author: Water

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: That is a great Android cellphone I ever seen. Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Zhaolin Wang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off ..I love the color of this phone . I purchased the Ion Gold device and let me tell you the look of this phone is amazing. The color is brilliant It is Super sleek and it can keep up with me through out the day with its amazing battery life. SMOOTH is the key word for this device!! With the brilliant screen and its incredible camera the Axon is what ive been waiting for!!! The gold color of the device mixed with its sweet features i cant help but call this device... the "Champagne Room". Great job ZTE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is great. The only problems she's had out of it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this phone in March and so far she loves it. It's big, but not too big. The picture quality is great. The only problems she's had out of it, was something before they had an update to fix it, but other than that she has not had a problem out of it. She had an iPhone 5C before this phone, and she has to say the sound quality is much better. She and I both recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Axon Pro is a beast for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this phone is as expected, except for the fact that I didn't get The JBL Ear buds. I got cheap Ear pods Knock off with it. Now to the Review it self: Powerful Snap Dragon 810 Octa-Core Processor, Great Hi-Fi sound, Beautiful Quad HD Display, Decent Call Quality (calls are loud in Clear and people never had a hard time hearing me). This phone has a lot of bang for your Buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone!! I was looking for the perfect unlocked phone for travel and this is perfect. The processor makes the device run so smoothly, fast and efficient. Not one issues thus far. Gold color is very classy, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ashley s

customer_reviews.title: It is not living up to all the hype I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not living up to all the hype I read about it. It constantly drops calls and says no service. Internet is slow and camera is not very clear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone, Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a premium device at a bargain. Great camera, awesome screen, and great sound at a great price. Love that it comes with a pair of JBL headphones. The multiple color options are a plus. This device can compete with any device on the market.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: zte phone
customer_reviews.text: I don't really care for it. I keep having issues with air mode coming on while talking and the dumb camera being turn on. I will most likely put this up for sale asap. I had to add one thing make sure you get the correct apn settings from your carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Nace

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE LOVE MY NEW ZTE GOLD AXON!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is just down right Classy and Slick... I had a choice of 3 colors and I am glad I picked GOLD. It's beautiful. I'm having fun with the Dual Camera's on the Back. Creating some interesting images in Multi Exposure. With 4G's of RAM, 32G on board, it's very smooth and quick. Friends and family are asking, "Wow, what is that? Where did you buy it?" My response, "Amazon.com for only $450.00".
customer_reviews.author: 6 foot tall

customer_reviews.title: 1 STAR
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this phone for a little over 60 days.....the power button is completely stuck ...the button rolled over on its side and will not extend....the phone is totally unusable.... we must buy another phone....we paid almost $300.00 for this phone... the warranty lasted 30 days... buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trouble Making Phone Calls
customer_reviews.text: Myself and others have been having trouble making phone calls. Apparently this phone has had the problem since January of 2016. I assume it's not going to be fixed........at least for awhile. I am going to return my phone. Other then this the phone seems just fine. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Windrider

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: T mobile data signal was horrific. Phone was laggy and would get hot quick under very light loads.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny ballgame

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this phone
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this phone.. This will be my 3rd replacement this this time the power switch. I also sent dealer and amazon a return request about 2 weeks ago no word. Ill try again. the buttons are very poorly located. if you try adjusting volume you hit power button or the button on lower right side. I think its for camera function of of some kind. oh yeah NO Instruction manual. I had to download it. Still haven't printed it out because the thing keeps acting up. 115-4866059-3015469
customer_reviews.author: huck finn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone used as an Amazon warehouse deal for about $200. Phone was basically new, only the protective film on the front of the screen was missing. Even included the OEM quick charger/USB cord and JBL headphones. You simply aren't going to find a better phone for the $$$. Came with Andriod 5.1, but 2 updates took it to 6.0. Easy but takes about 1hr to download and install update. Battery life is excellent, about double the Galaxy S4 it replaced. I'm on Cricket, popped the SIM in and it just works, great LTE coverage. ALL data features work perfectly, but no wifi calling on Cricket's network (Cricket limitation, not phones fault).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this Android phone, I'm very happy with its quality. I own a Nexus 6 and 6P and although the size of this doesn't really compare, the manufacture seems great, the screen is clear and bright, the touch sensitivity is nicely responsive. We're still acclimating to a subtly different OS experience -- I'm assuming that has to do with factory installed differences -- and I'm still getting used to the fact that the 'back' and 'recent apps' keys are black-on-black and don't really stand out visually. I often forget they're there. I would definitely recommend this phone if you want a spacious (64 GB) Android smartphone without typical budget-breaking prices.
customer_reviews.author: N. Austin

customer_reviews.title: For those who love listening to music and dont mind zte software
customer_reviews.text: For those who love listening to music this is better than an HTC ONE M8. Audio is amazing with the JBL headphones included. The one front firing speaker gets loud and i mean loud. The screen is beautiful with settings that alow you to set to neutral or get saturated colors. The camera quality is good in daylight(as with most smartphone cameras) but in low light you might have to tweak the manual mode just to get the right setting. My gripes are this phone has lack of finger print scanner and lack of sd card slot.,and ZTE needs to push marshmallow ASAP! PS I always push software updates when getting any phone and then factory reset.
customer_reviews.author: KARL PERALTA

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, love ZTE
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, love ZTE. You will not find another product with the same hardware for the price. Android is pretty much stock, very smooth, no lack at all. LTE works great with Tmobile. The only negative point is the camera during the night. You can not compare it with a samsung note or s5-6-7 but for sure your are paying just 200 dollars so accept the compromise. Highly recommended.:) I have not received any money or discount for my review. It is more than 3 months that I am using this phone and the battery is great.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving this phone. The design is so beautiful and on the bonus side I have no trouble using this phone. To be honest I'm so happy that I bought this phone because my old phone was a pain to use even though I spent so much time upgrading that phone.
customer_reviews.author: Yasuha

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound out of a cell phone i have ever heard Dolby Digital Organism
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is Bose quality or better seriously amazing True Dolby Digital This phone is worth more than any Samsung and I love Samsung had S4 best phone ever but this AXON ZTE IS UNLIKE ANY other BLOWs THE S6 out of the water in my opinion well don't think the AXON is water proof Camera is everything one could want I Love this Phone Thank you 32 bit sounds lol
customer_reviews.author: t mann

customer_reviews.title: Very good but an average premium phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, very good camera, just it has some cons: battery not enough for a qhd screen, poor personalize features (I think none), zero after android support by rom customizers (unable to be rooted), if you're an average user that just want a good phone to take pictures, use some internet browsing and youtube, sometimes playing games, that's ok, but if you want a phone near to the name brands, that's not for you
customer_reviews.author: cesar castillo

customer_reviews.title: amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: amazing phone and I am very hard to please..I research many phones before I purchase one. I go on expert sites and review and compare many phones. I am very sure that I did pick the right phone . And it has very easy to hear conversations on many phones do not have this quality volume. the recorder is very wonderful...Lynn Holder
customer_reviews.author: LynnHolder

customer_reviews.title: This phone is absolutely amazing. battery life is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo close to buying an iPhone 6 but after looking at several reviews, i realized that the ZTE AXON can do everything the iPhone can do for a lower price. This phone is absolutely amazing. battery life is excellent. with the heavy use and the many apps in background running by 3-4 am i still have 40-55 % battery life left. apps run so smooth and phone remains pretty kool to the touch. full charge in 45 mins to 1 hr at 20 %. am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: So far phone is great but alot of drop calls that I wasn't getting ...
customer_reviews.text: So far phone is great but alot of drop calls that I wasn't getting from my prior phone Sony experia ultra .I might change carrier which i have metro PC's and going straight to TMobile I want to see if it's the it's the carrier service or the cell phone itself
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Value for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The price was very attractive and the phone does everything that a Samsung or I-phone does.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flagship quality for off-brand pricing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, even though it's huge compared to what I'm used to. I've never had a flagship phone, so I don't know what differences there are, but I don't miss all the bloat ware most phones have. I'll download the apps I need.
customer_reviews.author: DaleE69

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but has some overheating issues. Can be remedied with cooling apps.

customer_reviews.title: What a great surprise! Really great phone
customer_reviews.text: What a great surprise! Really great phone. In a way much better phone than Samsung Galaxy S6 which I decided to give up for this one! :)

customer_reviews.text: Great little phone for the money - we have 4 in our household and never experienced a problem in over 2 years.

customer_reviews.title: Zte Axon is your Music Phone beats all others.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good phone no complaints. Music quality is the best as promised. Camera is good but not the best. 4 stars because the existing Music player has no option to play music files in Folder mode it shows Artists, Album but No folder option which is sad. Great Service from Amazon as always!

customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, very good value ... I activated with Straight Talk and works great.

customer_reviews.title: The Axon Pro has been a great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Axon Pro has been a great phone for the price. The battery life is somewhat low but the quick charge works well. Screen scratches easily for something that is gorilla glass.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Yesterday's flagship, at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone with lots of memory. Decent camera. Stutters a bit in games like War Robots, but in all other respects, this is a flagship phone at a rowboat price.
customer_reviews.author: Awayteam

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favourite brands. Very sad when stolen me this great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Martínez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device - styling
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device - styling, camera, voice quality are all top notch. I guess I wasn't paying attention, but it was a nice surprise to receive JBL earbuds in the box! They sound great. I've used other "phablets" before which were above 5.5" and I must say that this 5.5 form factor is much easier to use one handed. While using my phone I've received compliments and questions like "what type of phone is that" and "are those 2 cameras on the back of you phone" All in all I love having a unique phone that raises eyebrows because there aren't very many of them out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought in March 2016 still love this phone only issue is no continued updates planned.

The screen resolution looks sharp and I am already taking pictures and loving the photo quality! Out of the box, I noticed the JBL headphones which is an awesome accessory with the AXON!

customer_reviews.title: disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Never have a cell phone with such a poor reception. I miss most of the incoming calls. Signal is weak and sometimes it has none at all. Price drops 29% in 3 months' time. The only positive things are camera and playing music (sorry, I don't know how to describe).

customer_reviews.title: 32G storage is enough for me to store video and pictures in few months and also that is very cool design with dual cameras
customer_reviews.text: Really hope I have prime member for 2-day shipping. Finally received the blue one. 32G storage is enough for me to store video and pictures in few months and also that is very cool design with dual cameras. I took a lot nice pictures with kids.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Could be great, but completely locked down
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device, great specs, extremely smooth and snappy. The price is fantastic for what it is. The minimal skin they put on over vanilla Android is great. No problems caused by the UI or any of their custom features. So why 3 stars? There's no way to enter the Bootloader. Can't unlock the device. Can't replace the Recovery. No root, no custom ROM. Complete lockdown. Not cool. I returned mine because of how locked down it is. Hopefully they open it up in the future. This *could be* an amazing phone, but at this moment it's crippled by the inability to control it the way I want.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it got it very fast shipping upgraded was a little slow it's finally upgraded to new 6.01,os GOT IT to work with tradcfone very happy with my new phone excellent service no problems am a satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!! This seller deserves no stars. ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!! This seller deserves no stars. I contacted them when the phone started causing problems after 4 months and they did not even reply. The device is still having connection issues and lost calls, along with distorted sound, and I have no one to turn to.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.text: my son like it very much! use with at&t, signal is good, the LTE is fast. everything works smooth. the sounds quality is outstanding, it comes with two speakers and a JBL headphone!

customer_reviews.title: Not that WOW  : (
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound when it had good loud volume. But after several months of use, the volume started to fade and now I have to use a Bluetooth speaker to hear it better.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Rodriguez

product_meta.title: ZTE Axon Pro Unlocked Phone, A1P133, 32 GB Chromium Silver
product_meta.description: Color:Chromium Silver| Size:32GBMore than an awesome new phone, it's the nerve center of all things you. Where the latest in style and the features you asked for come together to connect you with your life more intuitively than ever. From its 4K video capabilities to its Hi-Fi audio performance, it's the phone made entirely with you in mind. It's all you.
feature_bullets: Axon Pro has all of the camera options you asked for, and some you never imagined. Take high-quality photos with its dual-lens camera, which gives you quick auto focus to capture the action as it happens. Shoot 4K HD videos.
You wanted it. You got it. Fall headphones over heels with the first true high-fidelity phone available in the U.S. that lets you hear music and record sound the way they were meant to be heard.

Beauty. And a total beast. Axon's super-simplified Android interface pairs full-bleed images for a high-end look and feel. It also comes with lightning-fast processor, 4GB memory and large battery for all-around high performance under the hood.
Available in three colors, your understated, yet instantly recognizable sense of style is all over Axon Pro, including a sleek metallic body and signature grill design.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars229 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
